headline: A Fresh Look at Willis Towers Watson (WTW) Valuation Following Analyst Upgrades and Upbeat Earnings Forecasts
summary: Willis Towers Watson (WTW) has gained attention after several upgrades from industry analysts and a strong set of earnings estimate revisions. This shift in sentiment comes as the company demonstrates improved business momentum and positive fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Willis Towers Watson. Momentum has clearly picked up for Willis Towers Watson, with the share price up 11% year to date and a solid 16.6% total shareholder return over the past twelve months. Recent analyst...
